tasks.label: Generate ImpLab ProgramInfo
args: set -euo pipefail; src="${file}"; dir="$(dirname "$src")"; while [ "$dir" != "/" ] && [ ! -f "$dir/lakefile.lean" ] && [ ! -f "$dir/lakefile.toml" ]; do dir="$(dirname "$dir")"; done; if [ ! -f "$dir/lakefile.lean" ] && [ ! -f "$dir/lakefile.toml" ]; then echo "Could not locate lakefile from active file: $src" >&2; exit 1; fi; cd "$dir"; lake exe dap-export --decl ImpLab.Lang.Examples.mainProgram --out .dap/programInfo.generated.json
